comment.body: @西木野真姬: Because obviously there is no women in the internet. Wait did I forget that it is 2017? :D

Hey, Kaffie, I am curious about your method and the tools you used. 
Also: What is the total number of active users?
I don't see Mastodon as the competition. I am dreaming of a connection between the two systems to benefitting both networks (basically making them one).
@Kaffie: poking at the ZeroMe.db myself it looks like it is very patchy, depending on the parts of ZeroMe I have actively requested. Could there be a script to crawl all of it?
